mapper.select: select count(*) from project where pro_mgr = #{id}
select count(*) from todo where id=#{id} and t_rend is null
select count(*) from SCHEDULE where sch_end >= sysdate and sch_rend is null and pro_id=#{pro_id}
select count(*) from SCHEDULE where sch_rend is not null and pro_id=#{pro_id}
select * from schedule where pro_id =#{pro_id} order by SCH_START DESC
select * from schedule where sysdate+3 >= sch_start and sysdate < sch_start and pro_id =#{pro_id} order by sch_id desc
select tl.tl_id tl_id,tl.tl_info tl_info,td.id id from timeline tl, schedule sc,todo td where tl.pro_id = sc.pro_id and sc.sch_id = td.sch_id and td.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update member set bg_img=#{bgsel} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select bg_img from member where id=#{id}
